dataset-deposit.title: Dataset Deposit
dataset-deposit.description: Register & highlight the important features of your dataset to make it more discoverable and catch the interest of other Data Space participants!

dataspace.title: Data Space
dataspace.description:
Please select a Data Space in which the dataset will be referenced.
You can also create a new Data Space from the OKP4 Portal.

file-selection.title: File selection
file-selection.description: Upload the files related to your Dataset by Drag & Drop or browse your file system.

file-picker.label: Drop your files here, or browse.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description:
The metadata allows to formally describe your dataset on form and content.
Be sure to provide clear and precise metadata information so that your dataset will be easily discoverable and usable by other users. The more you describe, the more it should attract data consumer interest.

dataset-upload.title: Dataset upload
dataset-upload.description:
Please check the information related to the dataset before validation.
You can always go back to previous steps if something needs to be edited.
dataset-upload.success: Your Dataset has been successfully uploaded!
dataset-upload.error: An error has occurred while uploading the dataset. Please try again or contact us https://okp4.network/contact-us/ if you need assistance.
